item.title: Writing Vocabulary: Medicine
item.author: ChatGPT
item.description: Alternative medicine (ɔːlˈtɜːrnətɪv ˈmɛdsɪn): Medical practices that are not part of standard care. Examples include acupuncture and herbal treatments. Traditional medicine (trəˈdɪʃənl ˈmɛdsɪn): Practices that have been passed down through generations, often based on cultural beliefs and practices. Espoused system (ɪˈspaʊzd ˈsɪstəm): A system or belief that one promotes or adopts. Western medicine (ˈwɛstərn ˈmɛdsɪn): A system of medicine based on scientific research and the use of medications and surgeries; often contrasted with traditional or alternative medicines.
